titleStmt.title: The VVidow VVhiterows humble thanksgiving for the Kings safe return With an account of John Hall's vision upon the first day of the eleventh month, 1693/4. And also a letter to a friend concerning John Hall's message with a letter from Jamaica concerning the earthquake that happen'd there; a warning to the inhabitants of the earth, to fear God and give glory to Him, for the hour of His judgments are come Licensed, D.P. April 18.
titleStmt.author: Whitrowe, Joan.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by D. Edwards in Nevel's Alley in Fetter-lane, for J.B.,

notesStmt.note: Cropped with faded print and some loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in the Friends House Library, London.
